alert.note: Alert for Koochiching; North Itasca; North St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 5:29PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN ITASCA, SOUTHERN KOOCHICHING AND WEST CENTRAL ST. LOUIS COUNTIES THROUGH 600 PM CDT... At 529 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles south of Littlefork, to near Big Falls, to 10 miles northeast of Waskish, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Big Falls and Margie around 535 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Koochiching; North Itasca; North St. Louis
